description:
BEAT REALITY

is our award winning

Music Producer and Rapper Approved

 Sound Reactive Cyber vision APP for Vive Focus.

amazing at parties or at home: turns the world into a neon sound reactive disco.

now, thanks to VisualBoy http://www.visualboy.xyz/beatreality

tip: try it with binaural beats and you get a simple Light Therapy Dream Machine for ANDROID

See music.

you can run a simplified version of BEAT REALITY

on your Android with Cardboard!

Based on BEAT REALITY CYBER VISION

A project by 

Enea LeFons, Antony Skarredghost, Massimiliano Glitch

#30daysinVR / #day31 

Based on the original BEAT REALITY app for VIVE FOCUS

https://www.viveport.com/mobileapps/8ea1eeee-cf14-4fe2-95b3-aba765f57448
